name: Emelda
wishText: Congratulations on completing 29 revolutions around the sun! ;)
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are a very special person
outroText: Hope you liked it! Happy Birthday! It's your day, enjoy!.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to repeat.
